response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ["Age (21, young adult)", "medium", "Young age is associated with higher recidivism risk due to lesser life stability and maturation."],
    ["Criminal History", "high", "Having two prior arrests and a conviction strongly increases the likelihood of recidivism."],
    ["Substance Use (Marijuana use within past four years)", "medium", "Recent substance use can contribute to criminal behavior, although marijuana is considered less severe than other drugs."],
    ["Mental Health (Feelings of depression)", "medium", "Reported depressive symptoms may impair decision-making and behavioral regulation, increasing risk."],
    ["Employment (Held one job in the past year)", "medium", "Limited job stability reduces resources and structure, contributing to higher recidivism risk."],
    ["Education (High school diploma, not in college)", "medium", "Limited educational attainment can reduce future opportunities and is linked with higher recidivism."],
    ["Social Support (Currently living alone, never married)", "medium", "Lack of close social ties might reduce accountability and support in avoiding reoffending."],
    ["Family and Environment (Urban upbringing in a small household)", "medium", "Growing up in an urban area may expose an individual to environments with higher crime rates."],
    ["Religious Beliefs (Considers that God influences his fate)", "low", "Spiritual beliefs can sometimes provide a coping mechanism, though their protective effect on recidivism is uncertain."]
  ],
  "prediction": "YES",
  "confidence": 75
}

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 21-year-old male who identifies himself as Hispanic. He has been arrested 2 times and has been convicted. He is 5 feet 9 inches and weighs 260 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He has a high school diploma and is not enrolled in college. He has held 1 job during the year. He has used drugs in the past four years (marijuana) and some of the time during the past month he has felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer him up. At a young age, he lived with his biological mother in a household of size 3, in an urban area. He considers that God has something to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
